items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 5 November 2023
items.title: Unglaublich kurze Ladekapazität; sehr enttäuschend
items.review_text:
Produkt konsequent erstmalig aufgeladen. Schon nach kurzer Zeit (etwa 1 Stunde) war die Kapazität erschöpft und die Kopfhörer konnten nicht mehr genutzt werden. Auch bei weiteren Versuchen wurde das nicht besser. Diesen Artikel kann man so nicht empfehlen - das reicht ja nicht mal für ein "Album"!
Wurde zurückgeschickt - immerhin war die Erstattung problemlos möglich. Daher (noch) "2 Sterne".

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 14 October 2023
items.title: Funktioniert nicht
items.review_text: Das Gerät leuchtet beim Aufladen rot. Es ist nicht möglich, die Inear Kopfhörer mit meinem Android Handy zu koppeln

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 14 August 2023
items.title: Schlechteste Bluetooth Kopfhörer
items.review_text:
Die Kopfhörer sind pünktlich gekommen deswegen den einen Stern.
Ausgepackt Augeladen in voller Vorfreude auf die nächsten Hörbücher.
Der Sound ist dem Preis entsprechend, da kann man leider nicht viel verlangen.
Aber jetzt das schlimmste die Handhabung Steuern geht mal gar nicht entweder sie reagieren null oder nur ab und an wenn sie Lust haben.
Wie gesagt für wenig Geld kann man nicht viel verlangen aber für unter 30€ gibt's weit aus bessere Bluetooth Kopfhörer.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 14 August 2023
items.title: Vorsicht!!!
items.review_text: Finger weg. Absoluter Schrott, billigster Kunststoff, Akku nach 5 Minuten leer. Rezensionen und Sterne gehören nicht zum verkauften Artikel. Grenzt an Betrug!!!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 12 October 2023
items.title: Must have for little ones
items.review_text: Great height and weight for my little one to move around the bathroom for brushing his teeth or getting to the toilet.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 23 August 2023
items.title: Sturdy with simple good looks
items.review_text: If you have to add a plastic kiddie step-stool to your bathroom, this is one of the least offensive ones I found online, aesthetically. The plain white and gray is clean-looking and blends well into the bathroom decor. Broad and sturdy. No sharp edges for little feet.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2023
items.title: Not just for toddlers!
items.review_text: Great size and height for adults.  Non-skid pads are excellent!  Sturdy-holds adult weight just fine.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 7 August 2023
items.title: Great for a toddler!
items.review_text: Works great for my toddler to reach the bathroom sink!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 8 June 2023
items.title: Just the ticket
items.review_text: Perfect size for 2.5 yr old at the bathroom sink and the right weight for him to move it around. It’ll be good for potty use when the time comes

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 17 March 2023
items.title: Sturdy and not heavy
items.review_text: I think my daughter was 16 months when I bought this for her. She still uses it every day and she just turned 2. She uses it to look out of her window, and she can easily pick it up and move it to where she wants to use it next. She can reach the hallway light switch and wash her hands at the sink in the restroom. The steps have an antislip rubber on them and the base does as well. 10/10

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 10 June 2023
items.title: Good quality
items.review_text: This is a lightweight yet sturdy stool. Easy for kids to move around and use.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 1 January 2020
items.title: Sturdy, Safe & WIDE step stool with Rubber steps & rubber feet!
items.review_text:
We bought this step stool for our 2 year old to climb into her bed (the bed has drawers and a trundle, so it's higher up). We tried 2 other stools before this one and they either tipped over when she tried to climb up, or slid on the carpet so she slipped when climbing down or she slipped on the top with her footie jammies when using it and fell.
This stool solved ALL those issues! It is super sturdy and is wide enough overall and has wide enough legs to prevent tipping, even when your 2 year old steps one foot on the far end of the stool with all her 35 pounds of weight. Our daughter tipped a wooden stool this way and fell pretty hard, which is why I looked for this one! And I'm so glad I did!
It has wide rubber feet to prevent the stool from moving/sliding on the carpet or hardwood/linoleum when wiggly feet dangle down from a bed trying to reach it. And to top it off there is also rubber all over on the top of the steps (not just dots) so tiny feet in socks or footie jammies don't slip right off the stool (which is an issue with many other plastic stools).
It's also a large enough stool that it easily accommodates adult feet and weight. I'm pretty short and have used it when climbing into my daughter's bed to change the sheets.
We love this stool and highly recommend it for safely allowing tiny people to get a step up! It's perfect for tiny humans in tall beds, or potty training, or kiddo hand washing, or toddler tooth brushing, or any time the little ones need to safely climb or reach.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2022
items.title: Perfect - and truly doesn't slip and slide!
items.review_text: When my kiddo started learning how to use the potty we got him the same setup he was successfully experimenting with at daycare: the munchkin seat and the same stool they have. Unfortunately, not only was that stool too short for our home toilet, it slipped like crazy all over our vinyl bathroom floor. Not helpful at building potty confidence! This was our second attempt, and it's perfect. It *does not move* unless you intentionally move it. Sometimes that's a pain - it's bulky, and can occasionally get in the way of the door - but if you're doing for something large and sturdy you can't exactly complain when it's... large and sturdy, right? 😅 My little guy loves these steps, and often brings them into the kitchen so he can help me cook. So they're big, sturdy, and still light enough for an almost-3-year-old to lug around at will - not sure what else one could ask for! We're super pleased with this purchase, and would recommend these steps to anyone.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 18 April 2023
items.title: Just what we neeed
items.review_text: We are using this as a step stool for our toddler boys and they love it for getting on the couch or reaching counters. Very sturdy.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 12 April 2023
items.title: Extra Wide
items.review_text: We wanted an extra wide stool, this is an extra wide stool.  10/10 stool of the year

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 16 January 2023
items.title: Toddler approved step stool for so many uses!
items.review_text: We have two and use one for the potty, and the other is used as a stool, desk, chair, and play stand. It is durable, eye pleasing, and toddler proof.  We love our stools and use them many times a day.  Get the best and buy this one!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 8 September 2020
items.title: Excellent toddler step stool
items.review_text:
I researched step stools for an embarrassingly long time when trying to find a stool for my 18-month old child. I read reviews and Montessori blogs all over the web. This stool is a good height in so far as my kid can actually reach the sink bowl while standing on it. Lightweight so she can move it herself (with supervision). Sturdy enough for parents to stand on. Doesn't look like a kid's toy, which means we will actually have a decent-looking white stool for adult use in the home when my child no longer needs it. Grippy non-slip treads and wide steps. And very reasonably priced. A wooden step stool would by lovely, but also heavy and expensive.
I had my research narrowed down to this stool, a Rubbermaid step stool (only comes in black and has a huge footprint) and the Prince Lionheart UPPY2 step stool (low weight capacity meant it would only be useful for a little kid). If and when we need another stool in the house, I'll be coming right back here to buy the iLove again.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 1 August 2019
items.title: Excellent Seller!!
items.review_text: Great product!!! I found this step stool to be very sturdy and lightweight just as advertised.  It does not slide around easily on marble floors, which is great, that was something I was concerned about.  It holds my 35 pound grandson well, however I took off one star only because it’s very difficult for him to use the potty , as he is not steady enough to be able to turn his rear to the seat,so I do have to  strictly monitor him . ( but this will get better with time :)I must closely monitor him also in the kitchen when he is at the counter helping, LOL, because he is so young he moves around without being aware of his surroundings, The stool moves of course. But all in all I am very satisfied with the stool and exceptional happy with the seller ,who reached out to me even before I receive the product...thank you for a great customer service ,it is greatly appreciated.  PS If you have a child that likes to climb things, I’m sure they will enjoy this product, my grandson did not want to use the potty until he realize he had to climb up on something to get there, LOL.  I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 27 February 2023
items.title: Nice product.
items.review_text: Perfect for 2 and 4 year old to move around.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 8 July 2022
items.title: Awesome little step stool!
items.review_text: This is a great little step stool for my 2 year old. It is light enough that she can carry it around herself (still deciding if that is entirely a pro) and it also has grips on the bottom so it doesn't slide around while she is standing on it. The steps don't get slippery either despite the large amount of water my daughter dumps on them from the sink. Very sturdy, not worried about this tipping over either.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 17 January 2023
items.title: Perfect
items.review_text: The product is perfect. And when i feedback about i didnt received my package, the seller support me so good.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2020
items.title: Great step stool for grandson!
items.review_text: We purchased this step stool for our 2-year-old grandson to use when washing his hands.  He now also uses it to go potty.  We like that it's wider, and the depth of the steps wider, than others we looked at.  While we do hold his hand as he steps up and turns around to sit on the toilet, the extra space of the steps provides more security.  Each step is completely covered with non-skid material, while other step stools only had non-skid strips or dots.  It is harder for him to maneuver from the toilet to the sink than his smaller stool at home, but his safety was our #1 reason for purchasing this step stool (and GG is happy to move it for him!)  It cleans up easily, is holding up well, and should be in great shape when our 9-month old grandson is ready to use it!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2022
items.title: Toddler Independence
items.review_text: I was searching for a tall step stool for my toddler to reach the sink, and this one is wonderful! It seems to be made very well, thick plastic, sturdy, and good non-slip tread on the steps. The bottom has non-slip rubberized material which makes it so the stool doesn't slide away. My toddler is short for her age, but wants to be independent. I wish I purchased this a long time ago!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 10 April 2020
items.title: Awesome stool, even better customer service
items.review_text:
I picked this stool because of all the fantastic reviews despite an expected delivery date of a few weeks out (I’m thinking due to COVID and this not bring an essential product). I got one of those emails from the seller asking how my new stool was, and I wrote back that I didn’t get it yet. They quickly acted and pulled some levers to fill my order immediately, and I got it the next day!
My 15 month old just started using it today, and I’m impressed. The plastic is thick and sturdy, and the anti-slip areas are SUPER grippy. I tried move it while he was standing on it, and it didn’t even budge. I also like where they put the handles.. he can easily grab it himself and walk around with it. Great product!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 11 September 2021
items.title: Safe and Sturdy
items.review_text: I bought this for my kid to climb onto the toilet, but they were a little too timid to turn and sit until they just tall enough to climb up on their own. We do use it for them to reach the bathroom sink and I sit on it while I help them bathe. I'm considering buying one for our local library because it's no fun washing a kid's hands in a public bathroom and this stool is sturdy, non-slip, and easy to clean.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 4 March 2022
items.title: Good product, we're happy with it.
items.review_text: Light enough for my toddler to lift but sturdy enough to not dump her on the floor when she gets up to toddler climbing shenanigans. I love that it has a large area of contact with the floor, and every part that is ouches the floor is rubberized to prevent skidding or sliding. Easy to clean and good height! It will be good for potty training.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 11 January 2021
items.title: The Perfect Step Stool for Little Ones
items.review_text:
This is THE perfect step stool for wee ones! It is sturdy, doesn’t slip on floor and the steps are slip-proof, too. My 2 yo granddaughter carries and moves it around with ease. Very well made. Thank you iLove!
NOTE:  We just bought our second iLove Step Stool for our wee ones. My daughter bought one and plans to add another soon. Child #2 will be using soon! These stools are the best ever — the width adds the perfect safety and comfort when using. Baby #3 will arrive in Dec. I expect we will purchase another one later on! ✔️✔️✔️💯

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United States on 7 September 2021
items.title: Second one cracked after a month; replaced and refunded quickly and easily
items.review_text:
I've bought two of these. The original from 2 years ago is still great; however the second one which I bought in May cracked along the back after less than a month and is now unsafe to use. I didn't realize the crack until after the return period expired as I would have opted to get a replacement, but I guess it's off to the trash now.
edit: updated to 5 stars for great customer service
